message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $165. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.
I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll meet you at $152.50. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $152.50, but I'm still a bit short. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $152.50, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I think it's time for you to make a decision. If you're not willing to meet me at $152.50, I'm going to have to consider other options.
